cast.name: 迪米特里·布尔热 Dmitry Brauer

awards:
第12届中国（广州）国际纪录片节(2014)
　　“金红棉”国际纪录片评优单元 最佳剪辑纪录片

writer.name: 玛莲•范德沃夫 Marleen van der Werf

director.name: 玛莲•范德沃夫 Marleen van der Werf

introduction: Sitting in her favorite oak tree, 11-year old Filine encounters little wonders in the natural world around her. She sees the beauty and dramas of a tree most people are not aware of. Then, as trees fall down in the forest, Filine starts to fear that one day she will lose her special oak tree and everything will change. The rebellious girl comes up with a creative plan to stop the tree chopping in the forest. But what if nothing changes anymore? Once Upon a Tree is a documentary for children of all ages. The film is an intimate portrait of a young girl and her special relation to an oak tree. The documentary focuses on the nature and natural processes in and around the tree. The interactions of the girl with the natural world around her give an emotional insight in the creativity, fantasy and fears of this young girl that wishes her life would never change.
